statements: SELECT * FROM lead_management_reports;
SELECT report_name, lead_source FROM lead_management_reports;
SELECT report_date, report_name, lead_conversion_rate FROM lead_management_reports;
SELECT * FROM lead_management_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, lead_source, lead_conversion_rate FROM lead_management_reports WHERE lead_conversion_rate > 50;
SELECT report_name, lead_conversion_rate, report_date, lead_source FROM lead_management_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_name, lead_conversion_rate FROM lead_management_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, lead_source, lead_conversion_rate FROM lead_management_reports WHERE lead_conversion_rate > 50 ORDER BY lead_conversion_rate DESC, report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM lead_management_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY report_date;

SELECT report_id, COUNT(report_id) AS report_count, AVG(lead_conversion_rate) AS avg_conversion_rate FROM lead_management_reports GROUP BY report_id HAVING COUNT(report_id) > 1 ORDER BY avg_conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM LeadReports;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name FROM LeadReports WHERE lead_status = 'New';
SELECT lead_name, lead_source FROM LeadReports ORDER BY lead_created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM LeadReports WHERE lead_status = 'Qualified' AND lead_source = 'Website';
SELECT dashboard_name, total_leads, revenue_generated FROM DashboardData ORDER BY total_leads DESC;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_status FROM LeadReports WHERE lead_status = 'Converted' ORDER BY lead_created_at DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_source, lead_status FROM LeadReports WHERE lead_source = 'Marketing' ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_source FROM LeadReports WHERE lead_source = 'Sales' AND lead_status = 'Lost' ORDER BY lead_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM DashboardData WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY revenue_generated DESC;
SELECT dashboard_name, total_leads, revenue_generated FROM DashboardData WHERE total_leads > 100 ORDER BY dashboard_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_status FROM Leads WHERE lead_owner = 123;
SELECT * FROM Activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_source, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM Leads JOIN Activities ON Leads.lead_id = Activities.lead_id GROUP BY lead_name, lead_source;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM Reports WHERE report_generated_by = 456 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_source, lead_status FROM Leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_status, lead_created_at FROM Leads ORDER BY lead_created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM Leads WHERE lead_source = 'Website' AND lead_status = 'Qualified' ORDER BY lead_created_at ASC;
SELECT lead_name, activity_type, activity_date FROM Leads JOIN Activities ON Leads.lead_id = Activities.lead_id WHERE activity_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT report_name, report_date, report_generated_by FROM Reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM lead_management_reports;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_status FROM lead_management_reports WHERE lead_score > 50;
SELECT user_name, role FROM user_roles ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT lead_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM lead_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Email' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT widget_name, widget_type FROM dashboard_widgets WHERE is_enabled = true ORDER BY display_order;
SELECT lead_name, lead_source FROM lead_management_reports
SELECT * FROM lead_activities WHERE activity_type='Email'
SELECT user_name, role FROM user_roles ORDER BY role DESC
SELECT lead_name, lead_status FROM lead_management_reports WHERE lead_score > 80 ORDER BY lead_score DESC
SELECT widget_name, display_order FROM dashboard_widgets WHERE is_enabled = TRUE ORDER BY display_order
SELECT * FROM lead_management_performance;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_status FROM lead_management_performance WHERE lead_status = 'Qualified';
SELECT lead_name, lead_owner_id, lead_created_date FROM lead_management_performance ORDER BY lead_created_date DESC;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM lead_activities WHERE lead_id = 101 ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT dashboard_name, dashboard_type FROM lead_dashboards WHERE dashboard_created_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM lead_management_performance WHERE lead_status='Converted' ORDER BY lead_created_date DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_status FROM lead_management_performance WHERE lead_owner_id IN (SELECT owner_id FROM lead_owners WHERE owner_name='John Doe');

SELECT lead_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM lead_management_performance JOIN lead_activities ON lead_management_performance.lead_id = lead_activities.lead_id WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT report_name, report_type, report_date, report_description FROM lead_reports WHERE report_type='Monthly' AND report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT dashboard_name, dashboard_type, dashboard_created_date FROM lead_dashboards WHERE dashboard_created_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY dashboard_created_date DESC;
